text: Petrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Maximovksky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 61 as of 2010. There is one street. == Geography == It is located 48 km from Sterlitamak, 3 km from Maximovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Petrovka, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
